jobRole: Specialist Cadre Officers (IT and Other Streams)
skills: IT Specialist, Network Administration, Cybersecurity, Data Engineering, DevSecOps, Cloud Infrastructure
jobDescription: Locations: Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Hyderabad
Who We Are:
The Central Bank of India is recruiting Specialist Cadre Officers in IT and other streams across various grades to strengthen its digital and IT capabilities.
We are looking for talented professionals to contribute to innovative IT solutions in banking.
What You'll Do:
Design and develop UI/UX for banking platforms.
Develop and maintain enterprise Java-based applications.
Enhance cybersecurity measures and ensure data protection.
Manage cloud infrastructure and database systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement IT solutions.
Key Job Roles by Scale:
- Chief Manager (Scale IV): Leadership in Data Architecture, Cloud Infrastructure, and Security.
- Senior Manager (Scale III): Manage IT projects and ensure implementation.
- Manager (Scale II): Develop and support IT systems.
- Assistant Manager (Scale I): Entry-level IT development and support tasks.
Technical Skills:
- Programming: Java, COBOL, .NET, Python.
- Cloud: OpenShift, Red Hat Linux, Solaris.
- Databases: Oracle, MongoDB.
- Data Analysis: Data Engineering, Machine Learning, GenAI.
- Security: Cybersecurity, IT SOC Analysis.
- DevOps: DevSecOps, Production Support, Application Monitoring.
Post Name and Vacancies:
- Specialist (IT & Other Streams) SC IV: 10
- Specialist (IT & Other Streams) SC III: 56
- Specialist (IT & Other Streams) SC II: 162
- IT (Specialist) SC I: 25
Selection Process:
- Online Platform Test / Scenario Based Test
- Personal Interview
Pay Scales:
- Chief Manager (Scale IV): Basic: 102300-120940; Approx. Annual CTC: Rs. 35.27 lakhs
- Senior Manager (Scale III): Basic: 85920-105280; Approx. Annual CTC: Rs. 29.17 lakhs
- Manager (Scale II): Basic: 64820-93960; Approx. Annual CTC: Rs. 23.54 lakhs
- Assistant Manager (Scale I): Basic: 48480-85920; Approx. Annual CTC: Rs. 19.38 lakhs
Eligibility Criteria:
- Qualification: B.E. / B. Tech. in relevant IT fields or MCA from a recognized university or institution.
- Experience: SC IV: Min 8 years, SC III: Min 6 years, SC II: Min 4 years, SC I: Min 2 years.
documents: Apply online through the Central Bank of India official portal.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree / Master's Degree / Diploma in relevant fields

jobDescription: Post Name and Vacancies:
- Graduate Apprenticeship, Technician Apprenticeship, Trade Apprenticeship: 1013
Selection Process:
- Legal Discipline: Written Test (80 marks) + Personal Interview (20 marks)
- Other Disciplines: Personal Interview
Pay Scales:
- Deputy General Manager (E-7): ₹1,00,000 – ₹2,60,000
- Additional Chief Manager (E-6): ₹90,000 – ₹2,40,000
- Deputy Chief Engineer/Manager (E-5): ₹80,000 – ₹2,20,000
- Executive Engineer/Manager (E-4): ₹70,000 – ₹2,00,000
- Assistant Executive Manager (E-2): ₹50,000 – ₹1,60,000
Eligibility Criteria:
Mechanical: Full time or Part-time Bachelor Degree in Mechanical / Mechanical & Production / Industrial and Production Engineering / Production Engineering.

Electrical: Full time or Part-time Bachelor Degree in Electrical / Electrical & Electronics / Power Engineering / Electrical, Instrumentation & Control / Power Systems Engineering / Power Systems & High Voltage Engineering / Electronics & Power / Power Electronics / Power Plant Engineering / Energy Engineering.
Civil: Full time or Part-time Bachelor Degree in Civil / Civil & Structural Engineering.

Control and Instrumentation: Full Time / Part Time Bachelor Degree in Instrumentation Engineering / Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering / Instrumentation & Control Engineering / Applied Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering.

Environmental Engineering: Full time or Part-time Bachelor Degree in Environmental Engineering (or) Bachelor Degree in Energy & Environmental Engineering (or) Any Engineering Degree with PG Degree / Diploma in Environmental Engineering / Environmental Science & Technology.
Scientific: Full time or Part-time M.Sc. in Chemistry / Analytical Chemistry / Organic Chemistry / Inorganic Chemistry / Physical Chemistry.
Geology: Full time or Part-time M.Tech. / M.Sc. in Geology/Applied Geology.
MME: Full time / Part-time Degree in Mining Machinery Engineering.
Commercial: Full time Bachelor Degree in Mechanical/Electrical /Civil Engineering or CA or ICWA.

Finance: Pass in final examination of Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (CA) / Institute of Cost and Works Accountants of India (ICWAI / ICMAI) (or) Degree in any Discipline with MBA of minimum 2 years duration with specialization in Finance.
Secretarial: Member of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India.
Law: Bachelor of Law Degree (3-Years or 5-years). Should have enrolled as an Advocate with any State Bar Council in India.
HR: Degree in any discipline and Post Graduate Degree / Post Graduate Diploma of Two years full time duration in Community Development / Rural Development / Community Organization & Development.
Medical Officer: All Degree/ PG degree/ DNB/ Diploma should have registered with Medical Council of India / State Medical Council/NMC).

skills: Linux, Troubleshooting, Server Hardware, Networking, Project Management, Leadership
jobDescription: Location: Berlin, Germany
Minimum qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience in a data center environment or similar technical domain.
- Experience with computer and server hardware, or troubleshooting/diagnosing.
- Experience with operating systems and networking infrastructures.
- Ability to travel internationally up to 20% of the time as required.
Preferred qualifications:
- Experience with Linux operating systems.
- Experience in project management and leadership.
- Experience in maintenance and monitoring of server systems.
- Ability to collaborate and partner with teams to overcome challenges.
About the job:
The Hardware Operations team is responsible for monitoring the high quality physical infrastructure behind Google's powerful search technology.

As a Data Center Technician, you will install, configure, test, troubleshoot, and maintain hardware (e.g. servers and their components) and server software (e.g. Google's Linux cluster). You will manage the configuration of components such as networks, routers, hubs, bridges, switches, and networking protocols. You will also participate in or lead project teams on installations and develop project contingency plans. In addition, you will be involved in the manual movement and installation of racks.
Responsibilities:
- Lead troubleshooting and resolve escalated technical issues regarding affected equipment.
- Contribute to and lead efforts/projects in the deployment, maintenance, and support of data center infrastructure.
- Help test and troubleshoot server hardware components and designs.
- Configure and troubleshoot OS-related issues on server.
documents: Apply online through Google's careers website.

jobDescription: Location: Pasadena, CA
Hiring Range:
$18.50 to $24.75 per hour
As a researcher in the Daraio Lab, you will be responsible for working on wearable devices and creating experimental setups to understand wave motion in solids.
Initially, you will be trained in ongoing research in wearable devices and lab equipment.
You will take measurements from wave motion experiments, adjust, and troubleshoot any equipment, and design and manufacture components as needed.
You will work with other scholars to design experiments and evaluate findings for future research.

Essential Job Duties include setting up experimental procedures, calibrating equipment, working on software development in MATLAB, designing and manufacturing components, troubleshooting software and hardware, providing support with 3D CAD and ISO standards, attending group meetings, and reporting findings.
